name: MARDEK-Engine
description:
Controls:

  • Walk: WASD
  • Interaction: E
  • Return: Q
  • Open menu: Tab

This project is intended to be used as a base for development of future chapters or mods by third-parties.

The source code can be found at https://github.com/GeorgeManeta/MARDEK-Engine
Contributions can be discussed at this discord server https://discord.gg/4MsxX3bzYr
